item.title: JSON Resume Themes
item.description: I customized and tweaked multiple existing themes for my resume, which can be viewed in conjunction with my JSON Resume. I didn’t build these from scratch, only customized them to my liking. Currently I have customized 14 themes, all of which can be viewed from the homepage of this site. Users can easily view my Resume by selecting a different one from a dropdown menu. Each theme is unique and has a different style for different audiences.
